question: Which one of the following statements is not correct?
option1: India is the second largest producer of nitrogenous fertilizers in the world
option2: India is the ninth largest steel producing county in the world
option3: India is the second largest producer of silk in the world
option4: India ranks third in the world in coal production
answer: India is the second largest producer of nitrogenous fertilizers in the world
explanation: India is the 3rd largest producer of and exporter of nitrogenous fertilizer behind China and USA. It has 9th rank in production of steel in world. Coal production of India ranks 3rd after China and U.S.A. India is the 2nd only to China in silk production.
